thread.section_title: Personal & Household Goods News - Yahoo! Finance UK
thread.title: Walker Greenbank enjoys positive first-half thanks to strong market growth
thread.title_full: Walker Greenbank enjoys positive first-half thanks to strong market growth

title: Walker Greenbank enjoys positive first-half thanks to strong market growth
text:
236.25 +4.2500 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Wallpaper and fabrics designer Walker Greenbank (LSE: WGB.L - news ) enjoyed a solid first half performance in the UK and US thanks to strong growth in its manufacturing operations and digital printing business. The interior furnishing company saw its brand sales rise 8.4% in reportable currency and 9.1% in constant currency for the six months ended 31 july 2015. 
UK sales rose 6.8% and overseas sales increased 12.7% in constant currency. The US market also reported good growth with sales increasing 18.6% in constant currency. 
As a result, the group said it remains confident in the outlook for the full-year. 
WH Ireland (LSE: WHI.L - news ) analysts maintained their 'buy' recommendation and raised their share price target to 250p from 240p. They said: "Whilst the shares have performed well in recent months and may consolidate at current levels in the short-term, the positioning of the group and long-term growth potential fully justifies the premium rating in our view." Shares (Berlin: DI6.BE - news ) rose 1.81% to 236.2p on Tuesday at 09:30.
